content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

> I still don't know how to remember to drink water when I'm hyper focused... if anyone's got tips on that would love to hear.

I've given up. Instead I've committed to chugging ~1 L in the morning and in the evening, and I *try* to keep my water bottle in front of me when I'm working throughout the day. I'll often forget to drink water while I'm working, but I don't feel dehydrated anymore as long as I'm drinking water before/after sleep.
